name: @janhq/monitoring-extension
description: This extension provides system health and OS level data
author: Jan <service@jan.ai>

scripts.build:publish:win32: rimraf *.tgz --glob && npm run build && npm pack && cpx *.tgz ../../pre-install
scripts.build:publish:linux: rimraf *.tgz --glob && npm run build && npm pack && cpx *.tgz ../../pre-install
scripts.build:publish:darwin: rimraf *.tgz --glob && npm run build && ../../.github/scripts/auto-sign.sh && npm pack && cpx *.tgz ../../pre-install
